project.description: Project Cnmaestro Cloud Router Development Build - 2.1.0

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
git config --global user.email "cnMaestroDevOps@cambiumnetworks.com" git config --global user.name "Cnmaestro Devops" git fetch --prune origin +refs/tags/*:refs/tags/* version=$(git for-each-ref --sort=taggerdate --format '%(refname)' | grep "2.1.0" | grep -v "noc"|tail -1 |cut -d '/' -f 3| cut -d '-' -f 1) rel_type=$(git for-each-ref --sort=taggerdate --format '%(refname)' | grep "2.1.0"|grep -v "noc"| tail -1 |cut -d '/' -f 3 | cut -d '-' -f 2 | tr -dc 'a-z') rel_number=$(git for-each-ref --sort=taggerdate --format '%(refname)' | grep "2.1.0" |grep -v "noc"| tail -1 |cut -d '/' -f 3 | cut -d '-' -f 2 | tr -dc '0-9') dep_type=$(git for-each-ref --sort=taggerdate --format '%(refname)' | grep "2.1.0" | grep -v "noc"|tail -1 |cut -d '/' -f 3 | cut -d '-' -f 3)
if [ -z "${dep_type}" ] then echo "\${dep_type} is empty" dep_type="cloud" else echo "\${dep_type} is NOT empty" fi
rel_number=$((rel_number+1)) echo ${rel_number} tag_ver="${version}-${rel_type}${rel_number}" echo ${tag_ver}
if [ -n "$MSG_PREFIX" ] ; then RELEASE_MSG="${tag_ver}" fi
git tag -m "$RELEASE_MSG" "${tag_ver}" HEAD
#prune old tags and always fetch latest tag #git fetch --prune origin +refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*
echo "build starts..." git describe
#clean the node_modules & build folder rm -rf build rm -rf build_debian rm -rf node_modules rm -rf server/node_modules rm -rf client/node_modules rm -rf test/node_modules
pwd ls -l
BUILD_ID="${tag_ver}" DEPLOYMENT="CLOUD"
echo "cnMaestro deployment type :" ${DEPLOYMENT}
#install all node_modules npm install grunt install
#grunt install dirty the package-lock.json so we checkout fresh code again git checkout .
#grunt build if [ ${DEPLOYMENT} = "CLOUD" ]; then grunt build --deployment=cloud --build=release elif [ ${DEPLOYMENT} = "NOC" ]; then grunt build --deployment=noc --build=release fi
rm -rf router_build.tar

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultSubject: Project Cnmaestro Router Development Build - 2.1.0:$BUILD_NUMBER result
hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
Hi All,
Project Cnmaestro Router Development Build with id :${BUILD_ID} is success,
Build Status is $BUILD_URL :: $BUILD_STATUS
Build Artifacts: ftp://in01jenkins02.camnwk.com/2.1.0/ login : ftpuser/ftpuser Commit: $GIT_COMMIT
Regards, cnMaestro Team
